    04rs0018-01-2020-001566-37

    default judgment

    In the name of the Russian Federation

    26 May 2020 year                                            g. lancer-Ude

    Oktyabrsky District Court. lancer-Ude Republic of Buryatia in the composition a judge Dandarovoj AA, when the court clerk Balburovoj SA,

    examined in open court civil case № the suit bank VTB (PAO) to Sherenkovu A. A.ichu, Sherenkovoj The. C. termination of the credit agreement, recovery of debt under the credit agreement, foreclosure of the mortgaged property,

    In DETERMINED AS About B & L:

    VTB Bank (PAO) He appealed to the court to Sherenkovu AA, Sherenkovoj VS on the termination of the credit agreement № from DD.MM.YYYY, concluded between VTB 24 (ZAO) and Sherenkovym AA, recovery of debt under the credit agreement in sum 604 747,33 RUB., the cost of payment of the fee at the rate of 15247,47 rubles. also requests to foreclose on the mortgaged property: apartment at: <address>, defining MODE FOR CARRYING OUT as public sale, setting the initial sale price at the rate of 1 889 200 RUB.

    petition motivated by, that DD.MM.YYYY the Bank VTB 24 (ZAO) and Sherenkovym AA signed a loan agreement №, under which bank He undertook to provide borrower 1 500 000 RUB. for 182 month exaction for credit percent, and the Borrower shall timely repay the amount loan and pay interest for use loan of 13,05% APR. The loan was granted for the defendant intended use – purchase apartment, situated: <address>. This apartment It is subject pledge bank. also ensuring proper performance conditions loan agreement DD.MM.YYYY He had signed a guarantee agreement № with Sherenkovoj VS, under which guarantor has committed itself to jointly responsible with the borrower the creditor for performance of the borrower obligations under the credit agreement. borrower improperly performed obligations under the credit agreement, payable as of DD.MM.YYYY is 604 747,33 RUB., of which: 555 157,54 RUB. – balance of debt, 36 865,95 RUB. – arrears of planovym interest, 3 123,15 RUB. – arrears on interest, 9600,69 RUB. – arrears on interest for the overdue debt.

    At the hearing the representative of the complainant bank VTB (PAO) by proxy Dymbrylova VS It was not, being Notification of the proceedings, announced the proceedings in the absence of a representative claimant.

    defendants Sherenkov AA, Sherenkova VS failed to appear, notified the proceedings. Applications to hear the case in the absence of defendants, or to postpone the trial in the court did not reported. Under such conditions court determined to hear the case in the absence of the defendant who has not appeared in the order absentia under Article. 233 Code of Civil Procedure of the Russian Federation.

    Having examined the evidence presented, the court finds the stated requirements subject to the satisfaction of the complainant on the following grounds.

    According to paragraph 1 articles 807 Civil Code of the Russian Federation (hereinafter rule of law shown in edition, force at the time occurrence of legal disputes) under the loan agreement , one party (lender) It transfers the ownership of the other party (borrower) money or other things, certain generic characteristics, and the borrower undertakes to return lender same amount of money (loan amount) or an equal number of others received things of the same kind and quality. The loan agreement is considered concluded with the transfer of money or other things.

    according to the article 819 Civil Code of the Russian Federation on a credit agreement bank or other credit organization (lender) agrees to provide funds (credit) the borrower in the amount and conditions provided for by agreement, and the borrower agrees to repay the a sum of money and pay interest it.

    On the basis of paragraph. 2 Article. 811 of the Civil Code, If the loan agreement provides for the return the loan in installments (by installments), then the borrower violates the deadline, set to return to the next part a loan, the lender has the right to demand early repayment throughout the remainder of the loan amount together with interest due.

According to Article. 363 Of the Civil Code with the default or improper performance by the debtor of the secured guarantee Guarantor's liability and the debtor are responsible the creditor jointly and severally.

    In accordance with Article. 348 The Civil Code foreclose on the mortgaged property to meet the pledgee's claims (lender) can be reversed in the case of non-performance or improper performance by the debtor secured liabilities.

    If the contract pledge not otherwise provided for, execution upon property, mortgaged for commitment, ispolnyaemogo periodicheskimi payments, It is allowed systematic violation of terms their application, that is, when violation of terms making payments more than three times during twelve months, preceding the date of to court or date directions notification foreclosure of the mortgaged property extrajudicially, even at condition that the each delay slight.

    By virtue of point. 1 Article. 350 of the Civil Code, realization mortgaged property, on which collection drawn on the basis of a court decision, It is carried out by public sale in order, established by this Code and Procedure laws, unless the law or agreement between the pledgee and pledger has not established that realization the collateral carried out in order, established abzatsami second and third item 2 articles 350.1 this Code.

    By virtue of point. 4 h. 2 Article. 54 Federal Law on DD.MM.YYYY N 102-FZ "On Mortgage (pledge of real estate)", taking a decision on foreclosure on the property, pledged under the mortgage, the court must to ascertain and indicate in it initial sale price of pledged property when it is implementation. Elementary selling price property for public auction determined by reference to agreement between pledger and pledgee, achieved in the proceedings in court, and in the case dispute - by court. if initial sale price of pledged property is determined based on report evaluator, it set of equal eighty interest market value such property, certain report evaluator.

    According to paragraph. 1 h. 2 Article. 450 of the Civil Code, at the request of one of the parties the contract may be modified or terminated by court order if material breach of contract by the other party.

    been established that the DD.MM.YYYY the Bank VTB 24 (ZAO) and Sherenkovym AA signed a loan agreement №, under which bank He undertook to provide borrower 1 500 000 RUB. for 182 month exaction for credit percent, and the Borrower shall timely repay the amount loan and pay interest for use loan of 13,05% APR.

        The loan was granted the defendant in cashless by listing loan amount bank account, open borrower bank. clause 3.5 the loan agreement provided, that the borrower pays Interest on the loan. Under the terms of the loan agreement borrower obligated to make Monthly payments repay the loan and pay accrued interest as monthly payment, in accordance with paragraph. 3.4 loan agreement, monthly of payment is 19 028,01 rubles. items 3.8 and 3.9 the loan agreement provided, in that case delay in performance the borrower's obligations repay the loan and/or payment of interest, as well as commissions, The Borrower shall pay a penalty in the form of penalties in size 0,1% on the day of the amount outstanding liabilities. said penalty be calculated on the date complete performance all obligations.

    Their obligations under the loan bank before the defendant fully complied with, which is confirmed by payment orders and not contested by the defendant.

    DD.MM.YYYY Sherenkov AA, Sherenkova VS for derived from bank cash on contract-the sale property using credit funds, purchased three-room apartment, situated: <address>. Ownership of said property registered for Sherenkovym AA, Sherenkovoj VS This apartment It is subject pledge bank.

Furthermore the DD.MM.YYYY the Bank VTB 24 (ZAO) and Sherenkovoj VS contract signed surety №-P01, under which guarantor Sherenkova VS I assumed commitment reply jointly and severally with the borrower the creditor subject to conditions in accordance with the contract for the performance of the borrower obligations under the credit agreement, in the event of failure or improper fulfillment of the obligations of the borrower under the credit agreement be responsible the creditor jointly and severally with the borrower in sum, of equal amount all obligations borrower under the credit agreement.

    Accepted obligations to Bank of interest payment and maturity principal defendant not duly executed. C DD.MM.YYYY under the credit agreement respondent does not It was made: no one of payment.

    DD.MM.YYYY the plaintiff in the address defendants They were sent requirements the refund of loan, interest on the loan and payment of a penalty not later DD.MM.YYYY, as well as intention claimant to terminate the credit agreement, however, this requirement is not fulfilled until now. evidence performance of obligations under the credit agreement, the court in by virtue of Art. 56 Code of Civil Procedure of the Russian Federation, not shown.

    amount of indebtedness claimant shows estimation of indebtedness. according to which payable under the credit agreement as of DD.MM.YYYY is 604 747,33 RUB., of which: 555 157,54 RUB. – balance of debt, 36 865,95 RUB. – arrears of planovym interest, 3 123,15 RUB. – arrears on interest, 9600,69 RUB. – arrears on interest for the overdue debt.

    data the amount of debt confirmed by the case materials, account statement, Submission of debt, which corresponds terms of the contract and requirements legislation.

    The Court takes these settlements, since by failure to appear at the hearing of the defendant, court prevented hear out his arguments and to give evaluation of evidence, that could submit defendant.

    After evaluating the evidence collected in the case in their totality in accordance with Art. 67 Code of Civil Procedure of the Russian Federation, guided abovementioned the rule of law, considering whether that the defendant not duly performed its commitments, the court finds recover from the defendants the plaintiff debt under the credit agreement in size 604 747,33 RUB., termination of the credit agreement.

    Allowing the plaintiff's claim to foreclose on the mortgaged the property that court also He finds them subject to satisfaction of the following reasons.

    According to paragraph. № loan agreement the enforcement of obligations under the credit contract defendant provided pledge (mortgage) apartment, situated: <address>, total area <data taken> q.m., with conditional No.: №, owners where are Sherenkov AA, Sherenkova VS (section № loan agreement).

    DD.MM.YYYY composed mortgage, under the terms where Sherenkov AA, Sherenkova VS handed pledge bank immovable property form of above apartments. P. № mortgage It provides for the right pledgee to foreclose on the subject mortgage.

    according to Otchetu the evaluation № from DD.MM.YYYY market price object made 2 374 000 RUB.

    As can be seen from the case formed payable as of DD.MM.YYYY is 604 747,33 RUB. It is pretty. To date the debt is not repaid. size the pledgee commensurate the value of the mortgaged property. circumstances, testifying termination pledge above property, the court is not established.

    Since the defendant did not performed its commitments, the court comes to at concluded that foreclosure of the mortgaged property: three-room apartment, situated: <address>, by sale at public auction, with the establishment initial sale price mortgaged property, which will start trading, of equal 80% market value disputed property, certain report evaluator, ie the at the rate of 1 889 200 rubles (2 374 000 ruble * 80%).

    In accordance with Article. 98 Code of Civil Procedure of the Russian Federation, party, in whose favor the decision court, Court awards to compensate the other All the parties in the case incurred legal expenses. due, than with defendants Sherenkova AA, Sherenkovoj VS due to pay stamp duty, paid by the plaintiff at the rate of 15 247,47 RUB., on 7623,73 RUB. with each.

    Vyslushat arguments defendants and rate submitted them evidence It was not possible because of its default at trial.

    Based on the above, guided by Article. Article. 194-198, 235 Code of Civil Procedure of the Russian Federation, court

    collect from Sherenkova A. A.icha, Sherenkovoj The. C. in favor of the Bank VTB (PAO) expenses for payment of state duty in size 15 247,47 RUB., on 7623,73 RUB. with each.

            Defendants have the right to sue, accepted the default judgment, application to set aside the decision Court within seven days from the date of delivery of the copies solutions of.
